body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Bailey Motors customer support. My name is Billy Bailey. May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathryn. Could you please provide me with your phone number so we can assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five, four one two, eight nine zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathryn. I also need your email address. Could you spell it out for me, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's k-a-t-h-r-y-n dot j-o-n-e-s at g-m-a-i-l dot c-o-m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that. Is there any specific issue or concern you would like us to address, Kathryn?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I've been experiencing some difficulties with the service at your dealership and it has left me feeling quite down.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Kathryn. We will do our best to assist you and make things right. Thank you for sharing your concerns with us today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kathryn. Have a wonderful day.
